title: Problem Construction and Framing Competency Enhancement Process Through Situated Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Knowledge and Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, Domain expertise: advanced, Assessment method: project-based evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can interactively integrate distributed resources (data, stakeholder opinions, etc.) in real-world social problem contexts to clearly define problem structures
Learners can recognize contradictions in given situations and design/modify problem-solving frameworks to resolve them
Learners can iteratively improve problem-framing processes based on peer feedback using online collaboration tools

resources: Open Dataset Related to Social Issues

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
